Plot: As the Large Hadron Collider is about to be launched for the first time, physicists are on the cusp of the greatest scientific discovery of all time -- or perhaps their greatest failure.
Title: Particle Fever
Actors: Martin Aleksa, Nima Arkani-Hamed, Savas Dimopoulos, Monica Dunford
tomatoConsensus: The concepts behind its heady subject matter may fly over the heads of most viewers, but Particle Fever presents it in such a way that even the least science-inclined viewers will find themselves enraptured.
